paper_abstract: A: Markov state models (MSMs) for the study of biomolecule folding simulations have emerged as a powerful tool for computational study of folding dynamics. MSMExplorer is a visualization application purpose-built to visualize these MSMs with an aim to increase the efficacy and reach of MSM science.
paper_title: MSMExplorer: visualizing Markov state models for biomolecule folding simulations
